General.Name: Shenzhen Genvict Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Genvict Technologies Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, and industrialization of smart transportation technology in China. The company focuses on automotive electronics, vehicle-road coordination, urban digital transportation, and smart expressway solutions businesses. It also offers car end products, including 4G vehicle terminals, TBOX gateways, ETC electronic label and car pre-installations, and automotive electronic identification tags; road end products, such as roadside terminal equipment, ETC microwave antenna and issuing equipment, RFID reader, automatic card issuing machine, wave radars, and ETC parking payment gateway. In addition, it provides digital holographic platform system to display traffic status; and V2X vehicle-road collaboration protocol stack. Shenzhen Genvict Technologies Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
